#labels Featured
This develop guide is to help developers how to modify and improve awbot.

= 1.0 Prerequisites =

Awbot requires robocode library to run and can be found [http://sourceforge.net/projects/robocode/files/ here]
Robocode requires [http://java.com/en/download JAVA 5.0] to run.
In order to build and verify the system you modify, it is recommended to use Ant 1.8
